briefTitle: Levocarnitine in Treating Fatigue in Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Phase III Randomized Placebo-Controlled Trial to Determine Efficacy of Levocarnitine for Fatigue in Patients With Cancer
conditions: Unspecified Adult Solid Tumor, Protocol Specific
summary:
RATIONALE: Levocarnitine may help improve energy levels in cancer patients.

PURPOSE: This randomized phase III trial is studying how well levocarnitine works compared to a placebo in treating fatigue in cancer patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Score Change in Fatigue Measured With Brief Fatigue Inventory From Baseline to 4 Weeks
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: assessed at baseline and 4 weeks after randomization
